attributes.action: We Demand a General Election Now!!
attributes.additional_details: During the biggest energy crisis we've ever faced as a nation and during a war in Europe with the Russian invasion of Ukraine; which could quite easily involve the whole of Europe we need a strong and stable government. We need a workable solution in Northern Ireland and we need to respect the wishes of the people of Scotland. None of this is happening, nor will it happen with our current government.
attributes.background: We the people of the United Kingdom demand a General Election to put an end to this chaos.
